vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.balances (REALMock.sol#113) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (REALMock.sol#206-244)
	- balanceOfAt (REALMock.sol#323-344)
	- generateTokens (REALMock.sol#416-426)
	- destroyTokens (REALMock.sol#433-443)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: MiniMeToken.isContract (REALMock.sol#507-514) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (REALMock.sol#258-275):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (REALMock.sol#269)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (REALMock.sol#272)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.claimTokens (REALMock.sol#537-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (REALMock.sol#545)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ REALMock.sol#474) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ REALMock.sol#517-519)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (REALMock.sol#507-514)
	- REALMock.sol#510-513

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: string public version = 'MMT_0.1'; //An arbitrary versioning scheme
vulnerability_findings.message: MiniMeToken.version should be constant (REALMock.sol#84)

vulnerability_findings.message: TokenController.proxyPayment (REALMock.sol#36) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: TokenController.onTransfer (REALMock.sol#44) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval (REALMock.sol#73) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in REALMock.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (REALMock.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (REALMock.sol#609): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (REALMock.sol#627): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function REAL(address _tokenFactory)

            MiniMeToken(

                _tokenFactory,

                0x0,                         // no parent token

                0,                           // no snapshot block number from parent

                "Real Estate Asset Ledger",  // Token name

                18,                          // Decimals

                "REAL",                      // Symbol

                true                         // Enable transfers
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'REAL.REAL' (REALMock.sol#613-622) is not in mixedCase
